## Multiple choice {type=multichoice shuffleanswers=1}

Which of the following generates random numbers from a Normal distribution

::: {.answer fraction="100"}
```{r}
rnorm(10)
```
:::

::: {.answer fraction="0"}
```{r}
runif(10)
```
:::

::: {.answer fraction="0"}
```{r}
rnorm(10)^2
```
:::
